show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
Today on Connect the Dots at 10 AM ET on the Progressive Radio Network, Alison Rose Levy speaks with Carrie Saxifrage... <!--more--> who writes about science-based activism and policy for the Vancouver Observer, an award winning, on-line Canadian news source.
An environmental lawyer in the US, Carrie is working on a book that combines adventure, science and policy to explore how the environmental consequences of human activity affect personal meaning in a time of ebbing planetary life.
